titleStmt.title: Of the love of our only Lord and Saviour, Iesus Christ Both that which he beareth to vs; and that also which we are obliged to beare to him. Declared by the principall mysteries of the life, and death of our Lord; as they are deluiered [sic] to vs in Holy Scripture. With a preface, or introduction to the discourse.
titleStmt.author: Matthew, Tobie, Sir, 1577-1655.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed at the English College Press] Permissu superiorum,

notesStmt.note: Identification of printer and place of publication from STC.
Running title reads: Of the loue of our Lord, and Sauiour Iesus Christ.
Reproduction of original in the St. Edmund's College Ligrary, Ware, Hertfordshire, England.
